detectors.description:
SnowSwap.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SnowSwap.sol#56-69) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SnowSwap.sol#62)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SnowSwap.sol#63)
detectors.markdown:
[SnowSwap.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SnowSwap.sol#L56-L69) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [balances[msg.sender] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SnowSwap.sol#L62)
	- [balances[to] += value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SnowSwap.sol#L63)

detectors.description:
SnowSwap.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SnowSwap.sol#71-85) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SnowSwap.sol#77)
	- balances[from] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SnowSwap.sol#78)
	- allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SnowSwap.sol#79)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:

	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SnowSwap.sol#22)
